body:
Henri Paul Perrault was born in Versailles, France, in 1867.  He exhibited works in Paris at the Salon of French Artists, becoming a member in 1899.  He won a 3rd place medal in 1896 and a bronze medal in 1900 at the Universal Exposition.  He is best known as a genre and history painter.  This monumental work is one of his best.

High auction record for this artist is $37,765.
artOnWallAltText: Henry Paul Perrault 19th Century Painting for Sale - Hurry Home
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 57 x 44.5 inches / Signed lower right

title: Hurry Home
